title: Podcast-Based Science Education Design in Constructivist Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Curriculum Theory and Foundational Instructional Design Knowledge
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, applying project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can integrate podcast content into science lesson design according to constructivist principles
Learners can design self-directed learning experiences through podcast production and incorporate peer feedback
Learners can propose at least three strategies to enhance learner engagement using podcasts in a PBL environment

resources: Open Content Resources for Science Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
